tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very gentle in behavior. He gives sufficient time to his each patient. One of the best doctor I have visited.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
******** ********* * Wonderful Professional.
Was having respiratory problem since quite sometime & i should be thankful to practo i came across Dr Walia's Profile & visited him for my ongoing problem.i had gone through endless tests earlier with so many doctors & was really frustrated with no relief & emptying half of my salary for 2-3 months. first doctor who didn't recommend any tests was Dr Walia. I just went with the years of experience he had and very nominal consultation fee of ₹300. His medicines did wonders to me i would say. Quiet satisfied with his treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was having acute infection & my health was deteriorating day by day had visited two doctors before consulting Dr Walia. i Wasn't getting any relief with the Doctors i had consulted earlier. While searching on Practo i came across Dr Walia's profile, Paid a visit to his clinic & discussed my problem which was aggravating day by day. Doctor diagnosed my problem & had prescribed me some injections & medicines. I could feel relief after his prescribed treatment . I would say a highly experienced professional who knows whats the drug of choice to treat a particular infection.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had fever i was in office, I was suffering from headache,
I just wanted to recover as soon as I possible because i was suffering high headache, I booked appointment for 5pm on the same day , even i requested to go before 5pm , but may be doctor was busy,, that was ok 
I waited for 5 pm 
I went there , doctor behavior so nice, after coming back i took medicine *** ** ***** *** ********** ***** *** ** ********** **** ****** ********* **** * **** ** ****** ** *********** *** **** ***** ******* ***** * *** *** *** *** ********** **** * **** ********* Really that very disappointed thing.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Friendly & nice Doctor, Explains everything properly, Charges Fair amount of money, doesnt make the patient wait at all & patient satisfaction is what i could feel is priority at his centre which is super impressive for any patient. Didnt recommend any unnecessary tests. just the required medicines.
Like his straighforwardness. Its a blessing to have such a nice doctor in our neighbourhood. Staff at the centre was also polite and cooperative.
I would highly recommend Dr Walia to everyone who needs medical treatment at afforable cost & quick relief to their problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was really helpful during this covid time. he gave a good advice and medication for covid mild symptoms. We needed urgent assistance from doctor and Dr. Walia did not hesitate to take out his time and advised us which reduced the tension. He himself had called and quickly answered questions raised after consultation as well.I will highly recommend him as it is rare to find such a great human being and such great doctor who actually thinks for betterment of patients.Thank you so much again doctor for your quick advice and help. We are grateful to you always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Walia is a very experienced and an excellent doctor, he diagnosed the illness as typhoid when other doctors diagnosed it as normal viral fever, all his medicines were very appropriate and highly affective in the recovery process. Thankyou so much sir for your timely diagnosis, lots of regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: I and my wife have visited Dr Walia multiple times, for hypertension, iron deficiency, hormonal issues, high HbA1c levels etc.  He is very methodical in his approach.  He mostly recommends life style changes and changes to diet and doesn't over-rely on medication. We would definitely recommend him to everyone.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My father having high sugar, Hypertension & swelling consulted Dr for treatment.Dr gave a diet  chart along & prescribed medicines to my father.
His sugar is in control now & rest of his problems have also started to be in control along with his medicines. Dr also suggested life style changes which has shown improvement in my Father.
Really Good Doctor.

tags: None
review: After viewing his good reviews on practo i visited his clinic. Friendly & Calm Doctor. Checked thoroughly & prescribed medicines. After 4-5 days of his treatment have started to recover. Clinic is well organised. Overall a good experience after a long time.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Doesnt Suggest bunch of medicines and tests. In fact even if he suggests any test, he doesn't have any recommendation to get it done though any specific center. His clinic is the best possible option as it is very close to our place. He is extremely calm,caring n cooperative doctor ever..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Listens to you patiently with utmost empathy. He is quite unlike the other "commercial" doctors whose main aim is to rip off the patients by recommending a battery of tests. He takes considerable amount of time to address your concerns. Highly recommended as a family doctor.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Excellent Listener, does not consider any personal gain if he has to refer a patient to another specialist when required. Very Informative & will get into the root cause of the ailment rather than just treating the symptom. Hard to find such Doctors even in specialist Hospitals where you end up spending so much on tests & get no benefit from it. would surely recommend him to all age groups.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Walia is very competent. good in diagnosing the problem and suggesting right medicine. I had severe muscle pain, fever as well as had painful joints. He examined & suspected it to be viral fever and prescribed the treatment & got better with his medicines with each passing day.  i wasnt suggested for any tests to be done which was the best part & totally satisfied with his treatment.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I was having constant fever every week. Had got tests done at various clinics but the problem still persisted. visited Dr Walia's Clinic & shared with him the reports of the tests i had got earlier. He Diagnosed me with TB & gave me the treatment for TB. Its been almost a month now i don't have recurring fever. Many Thanks to you Dr Walia for your help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,

would visit him whenever require good medical treatment.

I am very much impressed with the Doctors way of treatment and the investigations suggested with minimum expenditure. I am fully satisfied after consulting Dr Walia. To sum up. A very experienced doctor, humble, patient, Value for money & a Hygienic Clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor is extremely ************* *** helpful. Listens to your queries and concerns in detail and resolves them patiently.But above all, he is very concerned. Called himself to answer queries and never once did we feel that he is too busy to hear out.Thanks a lot doc!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: having uncontrolled Diabeties & hypertension since long and not many medicine combination were suiting me or would say wasnt getting the right guidance. I visited Dr Walia a month back & after taking his advice i would say that my Sugar level is almost normal & Bp is in control. I thank Dr Walia for his guidance & Lifestyle changes which he recommended.

tags: None
review:
Hi, With due respect for a sensior Doctor Mr K.S. Walia, I was highly un satisfied with his consultation. I am suffering from 104+ fever since 3 days and my dengue rapid was positive but antigen was negative. Now when I consulated Mr Walia. ** ***** ** ****** *************** ** ** ******** He was way casual in his words.  Since the current lab tests couldnot give any clue. I asked shall I do any another test, to my surprise he said 'No'. I said when do I come back for followup. To that he replied 'No need for a followup'. I asked is there any food related suggestions he simply said 'Nothing' . ** ******* *** ******* ******** **** **** ** **** ** * ******* ***** *********** * 

Won't tell you to not visit but I will not visit him again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am visiting Dr for last two years. He is always available for any kind of emergency even at odd hours though the emergency charges are definately higher than the normal consultation but would surely attend to you. my daughter was having vomiting and diarrhoea. rushed her at 2:30 am to his clinic. Dr Walia visited within 10-15 minutes Diagnosed & immediately started the treatment. My daughter was better the very next day with his treatment. Appreciate his dedication & commitment towards the patient. His vast experience positive & helping nature makes him one of the best Doctor around. Would definately recommend him to anyone looking for good treatment for themselves.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr Walia with constant cough, fever and stomach pain and after he recommended few tests and Chest xray the cause of it was diagnosed by Dr Walia. He recommended medicines to be taken for a fortnight after which i had to visit him for a review. My condition started improving after few days of the medicines he recommended and now i have to complete the full course of the medicine to return to normal self. 

Thanks for the right treatment provided to me by Dr walia as i was suffering for more than a year with the same condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have had the distinct pleasure of being on the receiving end of his genuine care for my wellbeing through listening to what I have to say and approaching an issue in what feels like a collaborative way. I trust what he has to say in part because he seems so open minded and not rigid in his thinking or approach. I can't say enough good things about him and am not at all surprised to see all the positive reviews. A big reason for wanting to write this review is hoping that he will see it one day and know the appreciation of his patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Walia is a remarkable physician. His integrative approach is progressive and incredibly effective for optimizing health. He seamlessly combines the conventional medical philosophy with his unique wholistic vision of each patient. He is passionate about his practice and wholeheartedly invested in the well being of his patients as evidenced by his truly sincere and genuine manner. He works closely with you to get to the root of a problem instead of just treating symptoms of it. Your new patients will be SO SO SO SO fortunate to have you as their doctor!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: A friend recommended Dr WALIA after he saw him . I had honestly given up on finding a family doctor . He was great with the kids, took his time and didn't rush us. He pointed out some issues with my health that should probably have been addressed sooner and I'm going to see him every one to two weeks until we get all my problems sorted out. It's great to meet a doctor that isn't just trying to get you out the door as soon as they can. I would absolutely recommend him to anyone looking for a regular family doctor. Clinic seems nice and staff was helpful too.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor did not even check pulse or bp. Suggested we go to a hospital. We asked for any recommendation for any medicine/remedy to give temporary relief. Refused and said now I can't do anything. Even though it was only early evening, and all tests could have been conducted, did not recommend anything. Not even a single test. Seemed to be in a hurry to get rid of us. So much so that he didn't even ask the patients name. Maybe we disturbed his sleep schedule. Also, even though it says the clinic opens at 5 in the evening, it doesn't. The help/compounder/whatever is very unhelpful as well. Please do not go if it is an emergency or you need an urgent consultation. Very unprofessional.
reply_text: At least they have acknowledged that the    Patient was an Emergency case .Nondiabetic lady patient entered my consultation chamber on Sat at 5.15 pm with the support of two people with H/O extreme weakness , difficult to walk & loss of appetite since 6 days post anti Malarial treatment (no lab test and doctors prescription available) To me she looked very weak and adviced for Emergency treatment & Investigations in a hospital . But the patient wanted her emergency treatment at her residence by a doctor whom I would suggest(Itold her it is not possible) Husband of the patient got up & passed comments  that today’s doctors do not treat patient by seeing pulse &eyes of the patient(Means What?) Today’s doctors are only commercial, they  only treat patients after Lab Reports & other investigations and patients are referred to hospitals for treatment of emergency cases . Being doctor Iwas more concerned About the well-being of the patient rather than money . This patient was not charged even a Rupee

tags: None
review: The medicines given did not solve the issue. He gave me a medicine which is normally given to someone undergoing chemotherapy. reply_text: This is not true No medicine was prescribed to you which is being used in chemotherapy patient

tags: None
review: Refused to listen to my issue. Dismissed my complaints and were generally uncooperative. If they didn't want to see me, I would have been fine if they just said it.
reply_text:
I appreciate that you visited us for pain in the shoulder area.
Following our check up , we advised to get X-ray done for future evaluation and prescribed medicine for pain relief. 
Per our preliminary investigation, it seemed that the stiffness is due to long desk work hours which requires  reassessment of work ergonomics.

We strive to deliver the best care possible to all of our patients, even if that means giving considerable consultation time.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: No proper prescription was shared with me. The doctor just ranted off the names of some meds and then clicked a pic of the prescription from his notepad and shared with me and there was nothing in the diagnosis section there, also all my complaints were not written. Also, the consultation was not a video call as was promised to me. I got a voice call from the doc and had to explain the issues on the call.
reply_text:
“Thank you for your feedback.
I would like to address the issue that you brought forth. 
We are committed to attending to our patients timely and so if the patient appears offline, we take audio call, like done in this case. 
The discussion was followed by a proper prescription with diagnosis and medication, sent through Practo.
We also offer patients the ability to do call or send message free of cost within 7 days that we’d like you to use for any follow up questions.

God has blessed Dr Walia with special healing powers, I must say. He has a very cheerful disposition & very positive in dealing with patients. May he be able to reach out to more & more people.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Walia is extremely patient to listen to our apprehensions, doubts, queries and comforts the patient which is very essential for a patient to get confidence in the Doctor... On the treatment front.. takes a holistic approach and doesn't jump to prescriptions immediately... Which gave us a lot of confidence in him.overall a very good experience..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Listened carefully to all the health concerns and asked relevant questions on the same. Prescribed only required tests and advised us to get these done wherever it is economical and come for followup but we got the tests done from his centre only as it was very economical. Really appreciate & recommended.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: He is friendly, approachable, and is able to offer enough sensible advice while maintaining an unusual sense of humility for a physician. recommends alternative therapies and approaches. He is caring with children and patient with anxious adults. His clinic is immaculately clean, and the staff are very attentive. The onsite sample collections make life so much easier. He is highly recommended by my 9 year old daughter & me.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We as a family are quite satisfied with the Dr Walia
His diagnosis is good and treats the patient with utmost care.
Incase he is not able to handle the case he refers to another hospital without wasting the patients time & money but that is rare only if the problem is severe. Apart from that he is a good Doctor to visit whenever there is any ailment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulted Doctor for severe Gastroentritis. was having high fever, vomiting & Cramps. I was given few injections & iv drips. after 2-3 hours i was feeling much better and the following day i was having slight pain in my abdomen for which he prescribed some medicines to be taken for 5 days. I am now fully cured after his prescribed medicine. Good Doctor !

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My whole family Visits him whenever there is an ailment. Suggestions given by him regarding medicine or habitary changes are commendable. Gives a very honest opinion. Easily reachable always, even during emergency he will visit his centre for you. The appointments have always been on time. Keep up the good work Doctor !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Very dedicated n informed doctor who's genuinely ready to listen to his patients. Knows the medicine which is best suited for the patient & gives the best possible advice without any financial gain. Doesn't advice any pathology tests, ultrasound scan or any other sort of tests which puts an additional burden on the patient these days. Probably the only doctor who understands the value of wellness. Really appreciate him for these qualities.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have never seen a doctor who is so much concerned for his patients health and wellbeing.My husband was having fever and after 5 days he was diagnosed with dengue.Doc himself called us so many times to ask his condition and provided proper advice on time. He always replied to our queries and concerns on time.Thabku so much Dr.Walia.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Trouble Sleeping,Dizziness,Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD) Treatment,Respiratory tract infection,Liver abscess,
review: Dr. is too much cooperative.  His behaviour is friendly. There was network issue in my home. Doctor tried continuously to connect me even I was unable to pick up his phone. Doctor  gave his time about 1hour 30 minutes.  I think any other doctor would neglect me in such network issue. Dr. listened me politely with patience. His behaviour towards patients is extra ordinary. Next day, Dr. also called me and asked the patient condition and suggested me .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: In the trying times of Corona, we sought video consultation by Doctor Wadia. Even though it was really difficult to analyze internal pain on a brief video chat but the doctor was very helpful and tried to understand the issue. We are really satisfied. He was readily available for any queries and was very patient. Thankful to have contacted him via practo.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
He is an honest and straight forward doctor. He tells you the probable diagnosis and doesn't leave you hanging there to know the issue until next visit/consultation

Tells you to take few relevant tests based on probable diagnosis.

I was satisfied with my first interaction with him

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: ***** * **** ****** **** **** **** he is thorough and thoughtful and always wants to help you think through what they best care for your circumstance would be. You never feel like he is rushing through the appointment and he always follows up when he says he will.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had a bad lung infection and had difficult breathing; Dr. Walia immediately knew what was wrong once he examined me, and went on to prescribe medications, starting with low doses and gradually increasing if the response was not satisfactory after a week.  He was very pleasant, courteous and patient, again hard to come by where doctors spend less and less time with patients in order to see more patients in a day. He is thorough and concerned. Highly recomend him, one of the best G.P.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Trust him implicitly. Great judgement and common sense, does not overdiagnose or over prescribe. Seems to be intent on getting as quickly as possible to the right conclusion and solution. Knows his limitations but does not refer to specialists unless absolutely necessary.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for my child vaccination. Very reasonable charges as compared to other paediatrician who charge a lot for vaccination and consultation.  I had some swelling issue which was rectified by the doctor within three days. 

Extremely pleasant doctor. Would visit him in future too for consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Walia was very patient spending time with me to find the cause of my problem and he was carefully listening to me and analyzing all data and test reports to diagnose me. I think he was successful to find the cause of my pain and starting my treatment.

So truly grateful, thank you Dr Walia!!!

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Stomach pain and stomach upset,Food Poison,
review: I wish more doctors had an approach similar to Dr. Walia. I have nothing but good things to say about him: knowledgeable, warm and gentle. He takes the time to explain things in detail and you leave his office knowing that your well-being really matters to him.I've been to many private clinics in the past, but my search is over , this one is only one now for me. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Distance can't stop me and my growing kids from seeing Dr. Walia as my family doctor. Great family doctor who has a very good understanding of my overall health and more than once has saved me from serious illnesses and pointed out potential harm when I was given a prescription from a specialist who didn't recognize my medical history and current medication list were not compatible with the drugs he prescribed. I always check with Dr. Walia 1st and trust him implicitly!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
